sourceDesc.p: Extract in Heritage Bookshop catalogue, 2002; addressed T. A. Trollope; dated 8 Nov 67.

dateline.placeName: OFFICE OF ALL THE YEAR ROUND,
dateline.date: 8 November 1867CD was about to set off to America on his reading tour (9 Nov). He had already given Wills Trollope’s address in Italy as a contact for Ellen Ternan: see Pilgrim Letters 11, pp. 474-5.

body.p: Thanking Trollope for his kind note and reminding him that he has already sent his love via Trollope’s brother Anthony.Anthony Trollope (1815-82; Dictionary of National Biography), writer: see Pilgrim Letters 10, p. 258 and n.
